questions.passage: Some schools require each student to participate in an organized school sport chosen by the student. People at these schools argue that athletics is an important part of the educational experience and that there should be a rule requiring participation. Others argue that students should be free to decide whether or not they wish to participate in organized school sports. Write an essay for a classroom instructor in which you take a position on whether participation in organized school athletics should be required. Be sure to defend your position with logical arguments and appropriate examples.

questions.question: The main idea of the paragraph maintains that the memory
options: improves if it is used often.
questions.answer: improves if it is used often.

options: do not know that too much sugar is unhealthy.
are fonder of sweets than most people.
have more cavities than any other people.
questions.answer: are fonder of sweets than most people.

We can conclude from the information in this passage that
options: women today are highly successful in winning equal rights.
only pioneer women have been considered equal to men.
historically, women have only achieved equality through force.
historically, the principle of equality alone has not been enough to secure women equal rights.
questions.answer: historically, the principle of equality alone has not been enough to secure women equal rights.

questions.question: Even after the success of baby carriages in England,
options: Charles Burton was a poor man.
Americans were still reluctant to buy baby carriages.
Americans purchased thousands of baby carriages.
the United States bought more carriages than any other country.
questions.answer: Americans were still reluctant to buy baby carriages.

This passage is mainly about
options: how people in different countries save their money
how people in England made pottery centuries ago

questions.answer: how a common expression began in a surprising way

questions.question: According to this passage, the wheel is an important invention because
options: it is one of the world's oldest inventions
it forms the basis of so many later inventions
it is an invention that can be traced to many cultures
it is one the world's most famous inventions
questions.answer: it forms the basis of so many later inventions

questions.question: Morse left the art world and helped to invent the telegraph
options: because he was tired of painting
because he wanted to communicate with people far away
because of a personal tragedy in his life
because he was fascinated by science
questions.answer: because of a personal tragedy in his life
